message: This offer may seem a bit uneven, but trust me, it's in your best interest to accept it now. The value of our potential winnings decreases with each round!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I understand you want a larger share, but my offer ensures we both benefit significantly while minimizing the impact of inflation. This is a fair deal.
Bob, time is running out! Let's be practical. This offer still gives you a good share, and it's much better than what either of us will get if we wait any longer.
